bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Guide: Adoption of ISO/IEC TR 24748-2011, Systems and software engineering-Life cycle management-Part 2: Guide to the application of ISO/IEC 15288 (System life cycle processes)
IEEE Draft Guide: Adoption of ISO/IEC TR 24748-2011, Systems and software engineering-Life cycle management-Part 2: Guide to the application of ISO/IEC 15288 (System life cycle processes)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: ISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 is adopted by this standard. ISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 is a guide for the application of ISO/IEISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 is adopted by this standard. ISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 is a guide for the application of ISO/IEC 15288:2008. It addresses system, life cycle, process, organizational, project, and adaptation concepts, principally through reference to ISO/IEC TR 24748-1 and ISO/IEC 15288:2008. It then gives guidance on applying ISO/IEC 15288:2008 from the aspects of strategy, planning, application in organizations, and application on projects. ISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 is intentionally aligned with both ISO/IEC TR 24748-1 and ISO/IEC TR 24748-3 (Guide to the application of ISO/IEC 12207) in its terminology, structure and content. 15288:2008. It addresses system, life cycle, process, organizational, project, and adaptation concepts, principally through reference to ISO/IEC TR 24748-1 and ISO/IEC 15288:2008. It then gives guidance on applying ISO/IEC 15288:2008 from the aspects of strategy, planning, application in organizations, and application on projects. ISO/IEC TR 24748-2:2011 is intentionally aligned with both ISO/IEC TR 24748-1 and ISO/IEC TR24748-3 (Guide to the application of ISO/IEC 12207) in its terminology, structure and content.
